project1.name: Personal Website
project1.description:
This very website! Although it has had many revisions over the years, this current iteration is built for modularity,
            ease of updating, and is aimed to better represent my current skillsets.
project1.tech_used: Linode, Cloudflare, Docker, React, HTML, CSS, TypeScript

project4.name: Poke.cli
project4.description:
A currently in progress project in which I've created a simple REST API that listens for incoming requests for, say a particular pokemon from the
                            popular Nintendo game Pokemon, and returns statistics or an ascii image of them as requested.
